articles.title: Zimbabwe star creates history by claiming monthly award - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Veteran all-rounder Sikandar Raza has created history by becoming the first Zimbabwe player to win the ICC Men's Player of the Month award.
articles.content: Veteran all-rounder Sikandar Raza has created history by becoming the first Zimbabwe player to win the ICC Men's Player of the Month award.Raza beat New Zealand all-rounder Mitchell Santner and Engla… [+2350 chars]
